name: DR BROWN
description:
When peace has been disturbed in society, there is one man to call: Dr Brown !

FEATURES:

-10 stages

-A variety of enemies

-8 shooting directions

-4 weapons (AR15, UZI, SPAS 12, M1 Bazooka)

-Infinite replayability

-Time based: a challenge for speedrunners !

-1 bit pixel art

-Great music, VFX and SFX !

-Arcade CRT style

-This game can be finished in a lunch time break (10 min)

CONTROLLER: Keyboard, Xbox Controller, Mouse

CONTROLS:

Move (x, y): 

-A, D, W, S. 

-Left Arrow, Right Arrow, Up Arrow, Down Arrow. 

-Left Joystick

FIRE: Space, A/B button on Xbox controller, Left Click on Mouse

Lock Fire: Keep FIRE button pressed and move in any direction

Unlock FIRE: Release FIRE Button

ESC: Quit the game/Pause (in gameplay, intro game screen)

START: Enter, Space, A/B button on Xbox controller

*The game is NOT a twin stick shooter :)

PLATFORMS: Windows, Mac

*More info about my work: Check out the Presskit

WARNING: The game has lots of flashing/screenshake elements which may be sensitive for some people. "People with photosensitive epilepsy may have seizures triggered by displays that flicker, flash, or blink." Source: Epilepsy.org
